install.name: Menu
install.author: Nooku Project
install.description: This module will display a menu

param.name: start_level
param.label: Start Level
param.description: Level to start rendering the menu at

param.name: end_level
param.label: End Level
param.description: Level to stop rendering the menu at.

param.name: show_children
param.label: Show submenu items
param.description: Display all sub-menu items regardless of whether or not parent is active.

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module
